thread.title: At trial of former aides, Ron Paul says investigators have ‘victimized’ his family
thread.title_full: At trial of former aides, Ron Paul says investigators have ‘victimized’ his family - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: At trial of former aides, Ron Paul says investigators have ‘victimized’ his family
text: DES MOINES -- Former Texas congressman Ron Paul, who took the stand Wednesday in the trial of two aides to his 2012 presidential campaign, said in court he and his family had been "victimized" by the years-long probe. As his former campaign chairman Jesse Benton and former deputy campaign manager Dimitri Kesari looked on, Paul […] ...
